text: Thæ̂cring brrdā p̄hū̂ thī̀ ṣ̄rạthṭhā nận khụ̄x p̄hū̂ thī̀ meụ̄̀x xạllxḥˌ t̄hūk kl̀āw k̄hụ̂n læ̂w h̄ạwcı k̄hxng phwk k̄heā k̆ h̄wạ̀n kerng læa meụ̄̀x brrdā xongkār k̄hxng phraxngkh̒ t̄hūk x̀ān kæ̀ phwk k̄heā xongkār h̄el̀ā nận k̆ pheìmphūn khwām ṣ̄rạthṭhā kæ̀ phwk k̄heā læa dæ̀ phracêā k̄hxng phwk k̄heā nận phwk k̄heā mxbh̄māy kạn
